alert.note: Alert for Dorchester (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 15 at 4:59AM EST until January 16 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Maryland and east central Virginia. * WHEN...Until 1 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow may change over to light freezing rain this evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions in Virginia or Maryland, please call 5 1 1. For the latest road information in North Carolina, go to http://DriveNC.gov.
